text:
Pandeyji ko pranam! _/\_
Sir aapse bada inspiration toh IITK Y17 me koi hoga hi nahi. Aapki jitni tareef kare kum hai. Aapka all round knowledge aur intellect IITK ke itihaas aur hamaze zehen me hamesha zinda rahega. Thoda dukh hua tha sunke aapke Civil Service ki ichchha chod di hai, umeed karte hain ki ye aag kahin fir se jage aur aap desh ko bhi apne jaisi unnati dein!
Jis tarah 4 saal aapne humpe kripa banayi hai waise hi aage banaye rakhen. Samay samay aapko hum yaad kar liya karenge, darshan aur gyaan avashya de dijiyega. Iske liye aapka abhi se aabhar!
Bhavadiya,
Kothari
author: Yugesh Ajit Kothari

text:
Gulati yaar tumhara wo Antaragni wala plan successful ho jaata na IITK life hi sidhdhh ho jaati :P
Hummne kaafi saara samay sath me nikala hai RM me, aur kaafi maza aaya hai tumse baaten karke both in and outside pclub. At one point RM toh hamara permanent home bann hi gaya tha. RM me raat ko AC chalu karna, KD wala wo room aur Blackbox ke samay ka wo pizza sab bohot hi fun tha. Some of the best philosophical conversations I have had have been with you. Kuch cheezen karni thi jo reh gayi, kabhi Amsterdam ya California me koi plan banate hain. Also Maine zyada tareef kari nahi tumhari but you know I know you are exteremly intelligent :P
Touch me rehna :)
author: Yugesh Ajit Kothari

text:
Jai Shiv Shambhu!
Mishraji aapko yaad hai kya hamare paas ke Jharkhand Union ka slack hai? Ab college khatam ho gaya hai toh uspe thoda active hote hain wapas kya kehte hain?
Baaki Mishraji aapke sath toh kaafi mazze kiye hain, shivji ki bhakti jo sikhayi hai aapko yaad rakhiyega aur naye mantra seekhne ke liye milte hain kahbi, koi trip plan karke. CP, Antaragni, CSE, aur aapka dhep apping xD humne 4 saalon me kaafi kuch kiya hai sath me, lekin thoda aur kar zarur sakte the.
Aapko shayad yaad na ho 3rd sem me NCL ke terrace pe aap aur mai galti se mil gaye the aur ek bohot motivating converstaion hua tha apne beech uske liye thanks! :)

Baaki apna toh chalta rahega, aur agar aap apna US wala long term plan execute karenge toh mujhe assistant rakh lijiyega please
author: Yugesh Ajit Kothari

text: Bhai sem 5 ka end, Mai tu Anish, thoda sa mango, pyaare gaane aur bohot saara khaana; wo raat hamesha yaad rahegi!
author: Yugesh Ajit Kothari

text: KD, OS, Algo2, Compiler, CCD, ShopC, 202 (yaad kar), Diwali, and jhelofying Dandi are some of the things off the top of my head. Okay SidJ, you're one of the best friends I have, and undoubtedly a very important part of my college life. Pretty sure we're going to stay this way for our (hopefully long) lives. Anataragi wala jashn jamate hain kabhi üçª
author: Yugesh Ajit Kothari
